div.h5: Give Your Child a Private School Quality Education for Free!

h1.strong: Give Your Child a Private School Quality Education for Free!

div.h3:
Welcome to Happy Valley School East Campus,
the East Valley extension of our ADE “Grade A”
Happy Valley School in Peoria, AZ.
div.p: Happy Valley School East Campus is a San Tan Valley Arizona Charter School dedicated to providing a learning environment that will improve pupil achievement in the basic skills. Our commitment is to have a teacher in every classroom who cares that every student learns, grows, and experiences success every day.
We take responsibility for and are accountable for the progress of each student. Most of our students move two grade levels per year in reading, spelling and math.

ul.li: Enriched & Supported Classes To Meet Student Needs
Curriculum Meets and Exceeds State & Federal Standards
Technology/Computer, Music, & P.E. All Grade Levels

li.div: Staff CPR and First Aide Trained
National Contests in Language Arts, Science and Social Studies
Book Fair, Science Fair, History Fair, Talent Show and Art Show

div.div: The original 1836 version of the fabled reading instruction books which for three-quarters of a century were used by four-fifths of all American school children.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_9 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.div: We have an intensive, “phonics first” reading program, beginning in kindergarten.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_10 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.div: Explicit and systematic instruction refers to the direct teaching of academic concepts and skills in a clearly defined sequence designed to grow over the course of the year and from grade to grade.

div.div: “I love the uniforms and academic difficulty. My child is learning harder work than kids in public school.”

h4.br: 266, E Westbrooke Rd, San Tan Valley, AZ 85140

div.label: Previous Posts

div.div: Pursuant to A.R.S. §38-431.02, Happy Valley East hereby states that all notices of the meetings of the Happy Valley East Board will be posted at Happy Valley School East Campus, 266, E Westbrooke Rd, San Tan Valley, AZ 85140 and on our website. Happy Valley School East is open to the public Monday through Friday from 7:30 AM to 4:00 PM. Such notices will indicate the date, time, and place of the meeting and will include an agenda or information concerning the manner in which the public may obtain an agenda for the meeting. Online notices will be posted here

div.p:

3.6%
